DOC.brief_summary: Prospective registry study to evaluate safety and efficacy of stent assisted embolization of intracranial aneurysm.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of StENt-assisted Treatment for CErebral Aneurysms
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate stent assisted embolization of intracranial aneurysm, record information about treatment and any event (death, stroke, hemorrhagic event) prospectively.
DOC.criteria: stent assisted embolization of intracranial aneurysm 20 or more year old not determined
